description:
On chilly days when you don’t feel like a toque, this cap will you and your ideas nice and warm. OR has quilted the classic 5-panel cap, and the result is cozy, like a puffy jacket for your head.

  • Stretchy nylon blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Synthetic insulation traps warm air and stays warm when wet
name: Outdoor Research Shadow Insulated 5-Panel Cap - Unisex
